1.brief: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God

properly, interrogative what? (including how? why? when?); but also exclamation, what! (including how!), or indefinitely what (including whatever, and even relatively, that which); often used with prefixes in various adverbial or conjunctive senses
properly, to cast together , i.e. increase, especially in number; to multiply by the myriad
narrow; (as a noun) a tight place (usually figuratively, i.e. trouble); also a pebble ; (transitive) an opponent (as crowding)
abundant (in quantity, size, age, number, rank, quality)
to rise (in various applications, literal, figurative, intensive and causative)
above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications

2.brief: abundant (in quantity, size, age, number, rank, quality)
properly, a breathing creature, i.e. animal of (abstractly) vitality; used very widely in a literal, accommodated or figurative sense (bodily or mental)
a non-entity; generally used as a negative particle
something saved, i.e. (abstractly) deliverance; hence, aid, victory, prosperity

gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God; occasionally applied by way of deference to magistrates; and sometimes as a superlative

3.brief: thou and thee, or (plural) ye and you
Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
a shield (i.e. the small one or buckler); figuratively, a protector; also the scaly hide of the crocodile
in up to or over against; generally at, beside, among, behind, for, etc.
properly, weight, but only figuratively in a good sense, splendor or copiousness
to be high actively, to rise or raise (in various applications, literally or figuratively)
the head (as most easily shaken), whether literal or figurative (in many applications, of place, time, rank, itc.)

4.brief: near, with or among; often in general, to
Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
to call out to (i.e. properly, address by name, but used in a wide variety of applications)
properly, to eye or (generally) to heed, i.e. pay attention; by implication, to respond; by extension to begin to speak; specifically to sing, shout, testify, announce
a mountain or range of hills (sometimes used figuratively)
a sacred place or thing; rarely abstract, sanctity

5.brief: to lie down (for rest, sexual connection, decease or any other purpose)
properly, to be slack or languid, i.e. (by implication) sleep (figuratively, to die); also to grow old, stale or inveterate
(by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed
Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
to prop (literally or figuratively); reflexively, to lean upon or take hold of (in a favorable or unfavorable sense)

6.brief: not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles
to fear; morally, to revere; caus. to frighten
abundance (in number), i.e. (specifically) a myriad (whether definite or indefinite)
a people (as a congregated unit); specifically, a tribe (as those of Israel); hence (collectively) troops or attendants; figuratively, a flock
who, which, what, that; also (as an adverb and a conjunction) when, where, how, because, in order that, etc.
(as noun) a circle, neighbour, or environs; but chiefly (as adverb, with or without preposition) around
to place (in a very wide application)
above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications

7.brief: to rise (in various applications, literal, figurative, intensive and causative)
Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
properly, to be open, wide or free, i.e. (by implication) to be safe; causatively, to free or succor

gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God; occasionally applied by way of deference to magistrates; and sometimes as a superlative
(by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed
to strike (lightly or severely, literally or figuratively)
properly, self (but generally used to point out more definitely the object of a verb or preposition, even or namely)
properly, the whole; hence, all, any or every (in the singular only, but often in a plural sense)
the cheek (from its fleshiness); hence, the jaw-bone
a tooth (as sharp); specifically  ivory; figuratively, a cliff
morally wrong; concretely, an (actively) bad person

8.brief: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
something saved, i.e. (abstractly) deliverance; hence, aid, victory, prosperity
above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
a people (as a congregated unit); specifically, a tribe (as those of Israel); hence (collectively) troops or attendants; figuratively, a flock

9.brief: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
something saved, i.e. (abstractly) deliverance; hence, aid, victory, prosperity
above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
a people (as a congregated unit); specifically, a tribe (as those of Israel); hence (collectively) troops or attendants; figuratively, a flock
